review: For the first hour I was disappointed the acting was poor and the film did not really seem to have direction, as the end of the film approached it sped up and al pacino sorted the acting side out. The final scenes were amazing, one of the best finishes ive seen and when he walks out onto the empty street you are given one of the best film moments ever.
